name: Pancakes
steps: Mix flour, sugar, and eggs in a bowl.
Gradually add milk while stirring.
Heat a pan and pour the batter.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook the other side.
Serve with syrup.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 180C.
Mix flour and sugar in a bowl.
Add butter and eggs, mix well.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Scoop dough onto a tray and bake for 12 minutes.

name: Banana Cake
steps: Mash the bananas in a bowl.
Add sugar and eggs, stir well.
Fold in flour and baking powder.
Pour into a cake pan.
Bake at 170C for 30 minutes.

name: French Toast
steps: Beat eggs, sugar, and milk in a bowl.
Dip bread slices in the mixture.
Fry on a pan until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with honey or syrup.
